home.title: Discover Your Potential and Grow Your Career
home.subtitle: The AI platform that helps you understand your personality, identify your strengths, and build your ideal career path through advanced psychological assessments.
home.featuresSubtitle: Discover how AI technology can transform the way you understand your personality and plan your career.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Explore a diverse range of psychological assessments and personality tests to better understand your strengths and preferences.
home.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your professional development needs.
home.ctaFinalSubtitle: Start today with a free assessment and discover your true potential.
home.footerText: The AI platform that helps you discover your potential and build your ideal career.

features.psychologicalEvaluationsDesc: Advanced personality and emotional intelligence tests analyzed by AI algorithms
features.personalizedCareerPlansDesc: Career recommendations based on your test results and preferences
features.advancedAnalyticsDesc: Detailed visualizations and interpretations for your test results
features.aiMentoringDesc: Intelligent counseling and guidance for your career development

testDescriptions.beckDepressionInventory: Assess your emotional state and identify potential signs of depression through scientifically validated questions.
testDescriptions.cognitiveAbilitiesTest: Evaluate your cognitive skills including logical reasoning, problem-solving, and analytical thinking.
testDescriptions.belbinTeamRoles: Discover your preferred team role and how you contribute most effectively in group settings.
testDescriptions.bigFivePersonality: Explore the five major dimensions of personality: openness, conscientiousness, extraversion, agreeableness, and neuroticism.
testDescriptions.emotionalIntelligenceTest: Measure your ability to understand and manage your own emotions and those of others in various situations.
testDescriptions.leadershipTest: Assess your leadership style, strengths, and areas for development in managing and inspiring teams.
testDescriptions.maslachBurnoutTest: Evaluate your level of work-related burnout across emotional exhaustion, depersonalization, and personal accomplishment.
testDescriptions.perceivedStressTest: Measure how stressful you perceive situations in your life and your ability to cope with stress.
testDescriptions.resilienceTest: Assess your psychological resilience and ability to bounce back from challenges and adversity.
testDescriptions.gad7AnxietyAssessment: Evaluate your anxiety levels using the standardized GAD-7 scale to identify symptoms and severity of generalized anxiety disorder.
testDescriptions.discBehavioralStyles: Discover your behavioral style and communication preferences using the DISC assessment model to improve workplace relationships.
testDescriptions.cattell16PF: Comprehensive personality assessment measuring 16 primary personality factors to provide detailed insights into your character traits and behavioral patterns.

careerJourney.title: Your path to professional success
careerJourney.subtitle: Transform your career with psychometric testing and strategic planning

step1.title: Take the tests
step1.description: Discover your strengths, personality style, and cognitive abilities through scientifically validated assessments

step2.title: Get detailed analysis
step2.description: Receive a comprehensive report with personalized interpretations and recommendations based on your results

step3.title: Create your career plan
step3.description: Use AI recommendations to build a concrete professional development strategy tailored to you

step4.title: Track your progress
step4.description: Monitor your evolution and adjust your strategy to achieve your career goals

benefits.benefit1: Scientifically validated tests for accurate results
benefits.benefit2: Personalized AI analysis for each profile
